analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sa ni dassana ttika vedanā ttika

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca a nidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca a nidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na sanidassana sa paṭigham na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca

original: anidassanaappaṭigho adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭighaḥ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
